text:
[Verse]
Walking slow under stars
Night so full oh so far
Whispers float in the breeze
I find you in my dreams

[Verse 2]
Shadows dance 'cross the way
Softly we begin to sway
Hearts align in the dark
We ignite like a spark

[Chorus]
Under the moonlight we fly
Hands together reaching high
Breathing in this magic night
Feels so perfect feels so right

[Verse 3]
Eyes locked can't look away
We are lost time won't stay
Midnight's our secret hour
Feel the rush feel the power

[Bridge]
World asleep but we are found
In this silence hear no sound
Every moment ours to keep
Forever in this love so deep

[Chorus]
Under the moonlight we fly
Hands together reaching high
Breathing in this magic night
Feels so perfect feels so right
title: Under the Moonlight
